name: Battlewoken
description:
Battlewoken is a 2D singleplayer tower defense game inspired by The Battle Cats and Deepwoken.

Browser hardware (GPU) acceleration is heavily recommended.

Controls General

Enter/spacebar - proceed

Escape - go back

Map

Mouse wheel - map zoom

WASD/arrows - move between the levels on the map

Level

A,D/leftArrow,rightArrow - move the camera

Equip menu

Drag the icons

Changelog v1.0

10th april 2023

Try to complete over 100+ terribly balanced levels with atrocious gameplay and dull progression. (The game hasn't been tested)

Contact

If you want to tell me about a bug or anything just comment down below or DM me if you're in the official Deepwoken discord. (OnDatKa#6074)
